org.apache.fop.util

Class UnitConv

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.util.UnitConv
  • Deprecated. 
    use org.apache.xmlgraphics.util.UnitConv instead.

    public final class UnitConv
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for unit conversions.
